Articles.Content:
Hello.

I'm looking for KerbalSpaceProgram mini-movies on youtube. I especially involve complex missions.

Examples:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ONP9jS14toE?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Could you recommend any?

Hey **Krakenfour**. We aren't making a mini-movie, but if you're interested in complex missions, my friend and I are trying out a *super* complex mission to the Jool system. You can watch it on our YouTube channel [here](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCmAVWm58KaBuFdRa04KauXw).

This is the introduction video:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/XXOcsLGDFEY?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

> 
> Hey **Krakenfour**. We aren't making a mini-movie, but if you're interested in complex missions, my friend and I are trying out a *super* complex mission to the Jool system. You can watch it on our YouTube channel [here](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCmAVWm58KaBuFdRa04KauXw).
> This is the introduction video:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> <iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/XXOcsLGDFEY?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Nice. I see you've also got part 2 up now?

After watching part 1:

-Yes! This is what I'm looking for.

-This video starts with 3 minutes of a rocket standing still :/

-While I like the commentary and the explanation images, you could really really use tighter editing. Less 'downtime'.

Part 2 is much better in regards of things happening on-screen.

Yep, part 2 is up now

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/-ASxp81UXjw?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
.
Thanks for the feedback. Even though we only released a couple videos, we're seeing in our YouTube analytics that the videos are probably too long. Although part 3 is still going to be in the 20 minute-ish range, we're trying to keep the editing a lot tighter to focus on the more interesting stuff. And part 4, which we're just starting, is a whole new approach. It will probably be shorter, and we're going to do our narration differently, to try and keep it more interesting.

> 
> Yep, part 2 is up now
> 
> <iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/-ASxp81UXjw?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
> .
> Thanks for the feedback. Even though we only released a couple videos, we're seeing in our YouTube analytics that the videos are probably too long. Although part 3 is still going to be in the 20 minute-ish range, we're trying to keep the editing a lot tighter to focus on the more interesting stuff. And part 4, which we're just starting, is a whole new approach. It will probably be shorter, and we're going to do our narration differently, to try and keep it more interesting.

Sounds cool. Will watch and get back to you.

I made this one last year... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/YuCCi_hHOA8?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

> 
> I made this one last year... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
> 
> 
> 
> <iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/YuCCi_hHOA8?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

I'll watch it later, but first impressions: dat lag.
